= Details =

We looked at:

* Freepository
  - This website had some good features similar to GoogleCode but all the features that we needed were not available in free version.

* Sourceforge
  - Not user friendly.

* OW2Consortium
  - Not enough information available.

* TuxFamily
  - doesn't support SVN (only for CVS)

* Launchpad
  - not suiting our requirements.
